Posts.Content: About three weeks ago I found a small lump in my right breast, it didn't hurt and from everything I read I thought it might be a cysts. It grew and then got smaller after my period. Again I thought it was a cyst. A few days ago my breast started to swell and became painful. My lymph nodes under my armpit are begining to swell. I'm concerned now that this is more than just a cyst and am wondering if this could be inflammatory breast cancer. I have a doctor's appointment in five days and hope this doesn't get worse. I am scared and am looking for what my next step should be. Could this be IBC or something else?
Posts.Title: swollen, painful breast with lump

Posts.Content: Hello, I know how you feel. I too have similar symptoms and am scared. I also have been glued to the internet am have the same concerns about IBC. I hope you fell better soon and this turns out to be nothing to worry about.
Posts.Title: New to site and worried. 1 2
